programme.title: Astral Travel
programme.desc: Astral Travel is an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Road to Mars
programme.desc: Elon Musk has had some bold claims over the years. Many have come to fruition, and we’re still holding our breath on quite a few… One of his boldest claims, BY FAR, is the Red Planet. Musk wants to have a million people on mars by 2050. Will this fantasy turn into reality, or just stay a pipe dream? Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel News Special
programme.desc: Space Channel covers the latest news, explores what is...Space For Humanity and more. Duration: 5400

programme.title: SC Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar Destruction
programme.desc: When a math prodigy discovers a new way of predicting solar flares, he tries to warn of an impending catastrophe. But no one in power will heed his warnings. Duration: 7200

programme.title: SC Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar Destruction
programme.desc: When a math prodigy discovers a new way of predicting solar flares, he tries to warn of an impending catastrophe. But no one in power will heed his warnings. Duration: 7200

programme.title: GRAVITY
programme.desc: From an undisclosed location, Agent Roy drops more exclusive video from Professor Avi Loeb and Arik Kershenbaum about life, and living in the Universe Duration: 1800

programme.title: Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Our Cosmic Connection to Music
programme.desc: The Big Bang, a video that was conceived and the music composed by Glenna Burmer, covers the 13.8 billion years of our Universe's history, from before the beginning to today. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Cinepace Award Winners
programme.desc: A selection from the 2021 Cinespace Film Festival. Cinespace is a partnership between the Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA. Duration: 1800
